channel.title: uwt file for a Linux Workstation
channel.description: Hi I want to rephrase a question. I want to create an Ubuntu workstation to use with Whonix Gateway simply because I'm very comfortable with using Ubuntu. I know I should copy the info in uwt into /usr/bin/uwt , but I am unsure of which uwt file to use. Is it uwt.sh ? Thanks again.
